This directory requires the gradle-wrapper.jar file to complete the Gradle wrapper setup.

You can obtain the gradle-wrapper.jar file by:

1. Using an existing Gradle installation to generate the wrapper:
   gradle wrapper

2. Downloading it from a Maven repository:
   https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/gradle/gradle-wrapper/8.5/gradle-wrapper-8.5.jar
   (Rename the downloaded file to gradle-wrapper.jar)

3. Copying it from another Gradle project

Place the gradle-wrapper.jar file in this directory (gradle/wrapper/) to complete the setup.
